eltMesULDMIB.name: eltMesULDMIB

revisions.description: Deprecate all objects in this module.

eltMesULDMIB.description: The unidirectioanl link detection module MIB.

eltULDTable.name: eltULDTable
eltULDTable.description: The management information of the unidirectional link detection.

eltULDEntry.name: eltULDEntry
eltULDEntry.description: A list of information contained in eltULDTable.

eltULDAdminState.name: eltULDAdminState
eltULDAdminState.description: This object indicates the unidirectional link detection configuration status.

eltULDOperStatus.name: eltULDOperStatus
eltULDOperStatus.description: This object is determined by local and remote port supporting OAM and unidirectional detection. If both local and remote port support OAM and unidirectional detection, it is enabled(1),else it is disabled(2).

eltULDMode.name: eltULDMode
eltULDMode.description: This object indicates the mode for unidirectional link detection. shutdown: if any unidirectional link is detected, disable the port and log an event. normal: only log an event when a unidirectional link is detected.

eltULDDiscoveryTime.name: eltULDDiscoveryTime
eltULDDiscoveryTime.description: This object indicates the neighbor discovery time for unidirectional link detection. If the discovery time ends, the unidirectional link detection starts.

eltULDIsAggressive.name: eltULDIsAggressive
eltULDIsAggressive.description: This object indicates the mode for unidirectional link detection protocol. If true then port is considered to be UNIDIRECTIONAL if there is no answer from remote side during discovery timeout. If false then port is considered to be UNKNOWN.

eltULDLinkStatus.name: eltULDLinkStatus
eltULDLinkStatus.description: This object indicates the link status, which is a result of unidirectional link detection.

eltULDLinkStatusChanged.name: eltULDLinkStatusChanged
eltULDLinkStatusChanged.description: A eltULDLinkStatusChanged notification is sent when a local link status has been changed. This event should not be sent more then one per second.
